mapper.select: SELECT CENTER_ID, FLOOR_SEQ, PART_SEQ, SEAT_ID, SEAT_NAME, SEAT_USEYN, QR_PLAYYN, SEAT_TOP, SEAT_LEFT, SEAT_FIX_USERYN, SEAT_FIX_USER_ID, ORG_CD, SEAT_ORDER, SEAT_NUMBER, REG_ID, UPDATE_ID, REG_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, SEAT_GUBUN, PAY_CLASSIFICATION, PAY_GUBUN, PAY_COST, SEAT_CONFIRMGUBUN, RES_REQDAY, CASE WHEN SEAT_FIX_USERYN = 'Y' AND SEAT_FIX_USER_ID IS NOT NULL AND SEAT_FIX_GUBUN = 'G' THEN ( SELECT EMPNAME FROM tb_empInfo WHERE EMPNO = a.SEAT_FIX_USER_ID ) WHEN SEAT_FIX_USERYN = 'Y' AND SEAT_FIX_USER_ID IS NOT NULL AND SEAT_FIX_GUBUN = 'C' THEN ( SELECT USER_NAME FROM tb_userinfo WHERE USER_NO = a.SEAT_FIX_USER_ID ) ELSE '' END EMPNAME, SEAT_LABEL_USEYN, SEAT_LABEL_STATUS, SEAT_LABEL_CODE, SEAT_LABEL_TEMPLATE, dbo.FN_DETAILCODENM(SEAT_LABEL_TEMPLATE) LABEL_TEMPLATE_TXT, SEAT_FIX_GUBUN FROM TB_SEATINFO a WHERE SEAT_ID = #{seatId}
SELECT EMPNAME, EMPTELPHONE, DEPT_NM, WORKINFO from dbo.fn_userinfo(#{seatFixGubun}, #{seatFixUserId})

SELECT a.SEAT_ID, a.SEAT_NAME, a.SEAT_FIX_USERYN, a.SEAT_FIX_USER_ID, a.SEAT_LABEL_USEYN, a.SEAT_LABEL_STATUS, a.SEAT_LABEL_CODE, a.SEAT_LABEL_TEMPLATE, dbo.FN_DETAILCODENM(a.SEAT_LABEL_TEMPLATE) LABEL_TEMPLATE_TXT, a.SEAT_FIX_GUBUN, bb.EMPNAME, bb.DEPTNAME, bb.EMPTELPHONE, WORKINFO FROM TB_SEATINFO a LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT X.* FROM ( SELECT b.EMPNAME, b.DEPTNAME, b.EMPTELPHONE, dbo.FN_DETAILCODENM(b.PRE_WORKINFO) WORKINFO , EMPNO FROM TB_EMPINFO b ) X WHERE CAST( CONVERT(time,GETDATE()) AS VARCHAR(5)) BETWEEN SUBSTRING(X.WORKINFO, 0, CHARINDEX('~',X.WORKINFO)) AND SUBSTRING(X.WORKINFO, CHARINDEX('~',X.WORKINFO)+1 , 10) ) bb ON a.SEAT_FIX_USER_ID = bb.EMPNO WHERE CENTER_ID = 'C21052601' AND FLOOR_SEQ in (6, 7, 8) AND SEAT_LABEL_USEYN ='Y' AND SEAT_LABEL_CODE IS NOT NULL UNION ALL SELECT a.SEAT_ID, a.SEAT_NAME, a.SEAT_FIX_USERYN, a.SEAT_FIX_USER_ID, a.SEAT_LABEL_USEYN, a.SEAT_LABEL_STATUS, a.SEAT_LABEL_CODE, a.SEAT_LABEL_TEMPLATE, dbo.FN_DETAILCODENM(a.SEAT_LABEL_TEMPLATE) LABEL_TEMPLATE_TXT, a.SEAT_FIX_GUBUN, bb.EMPNAME, bb.DEPTNAME, bb.EMPTELPHONE, WORKINFO FROM TB_SEATINFO a LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT b.ITEM_ID, c.EMPNAME, c.DEPTNAME, c.EMPTELPHONE, EMPNO, CONCAT(dbo.fn_TimeSplit(RES_STARTTIME), '~', dbo.fn_TimeSplit(dbo.FN_UPSTIMEDOWN(RES_ENDTIME))) WORKINFO FROM TB_SWCRESERVATION b, TB_EMPINFO c WHERE b.RES_STARTDAY = convert(varchar(8), getdate(), 112) AND ITEM_GUBUN = 'ITEM_GUBUN_2' AND b.USER_ID = c.EMPNO AND replace(cast( CONVERT(time,GETDATE()) as varchar(5)), ':','') between RES_STARTTIME and dbo.FN_UPSTIMEDOWN(RES_ENDTIME) AND b.RESERV_PROCESS_GUBUN in ( 'PROCESS_GUBUN_2', 'PROCESS_GUBUN_6') ) bb ON a.SEAT_ID = bb.ITEM_ID WHERE CENTER_ID = 'C21052601' AND FLOOR_SEQ in (10, 3) AND SEAT_USEYN ='Y'
